name: Instant Pot® Celery Soup
author: sashman
summary: Vegetarian celery soup made in an Instant Pot®.
ingredients: ½ pound potatoes, peeled and chopped
directions: Combine olive oil, celery, onion, and garlic in a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®)
Select Saute function and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes
Add potatoes, broth, salt, and pepper and stir
Close and lock the lid and set the steamer valve to Sealing
Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 10 minutes
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 15 minutes
Use an electric hand mixer or blender to puree the soup until smooth
Serve while warm or let cool and serve as a chilled soup on a hot day
